meanings.definition: A small case for holding business cards.
meanings.sent1: My new cardcases are perfect for keeping my business cards organized.
meanings.sent2: She reached into her bag and pulled out her cardcases to give me her contact information.
meanings.sent3: The cardcases on his desk were always full of colorful business cards, like a tiny rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of cardcases was like a treasure trove of professional connections waiting to be made.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cardcases sparkled under the office lights, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A case for holding playing cards.
meanings.sent1: During game night, we always bring out our cardcases filled with different decks of playing cards.
meanings.sent2: The magician pulled a deck of cards from his cardcases, ready to perform his next trick.
meanings.sent3: The cardcases on the shelf looked like they were guarding the playing cards inside, standing tall and proud.
meanings.sent4: His cardcases were like a secret arsenal, holding all the tools he needed to win any card game.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out cardcases held memories of countless game nights, each scratch and dent telling a story.
